summary: A Swedish family is found murdered in their home in Costa del Sol in southern Spain - all except the 16-year-old daughter, who has disappeared without a trace. Is it a burglary gone wrong?
cast: Malin Crépin|Björn Kjellman|Leif Andrée|Kajsa Ernst|Erik Johansson|Richard Ulfsäter|Elvira Franzén|Edvin Ryding|Hanna Alström|Magnus Krepper|Ruth Vega Fernandez|Gerhard Hoberstorfer|Jonatan Rodriguez|Lisa Henni|Fatima Adoum|Charlotte Fich|Robert Sjöblom|Julia Sporre|Rico Rönnbäck|Lennart R. Svensson|Fredrik Wagner|Ester Sjögren|Abderrahman Ben Yahya|Tom Schacht|Nelly Lundahl|Isabel Lagrilliere|Gustav Idsäter|Manuel Alonso Bernal|Ayoub El Hilali|Belebied Hassan|Rolf Nilsson|Janice Picconi
title: En plats i solen
